name: Fantasy Character Creator
description:
(Choose your Options by Clicking the Categorie and "Next/Back")

There is only the 'Human' option for now as this is only a prototype. But once I've done more Assets there will be more Option such as Demons, Orcs and Elves. 

Brief Game story:
Once the player chooses their character and finishes customizing it, they go into the World and do their quests for the city. This city is being attacked by the Osco's (these are the people who live in Osclovania). The main quest for the user is to get better at their chosen Race/Character and upgraded their weapons, once they have done all that they can go and try to defeat the Osco's. (This isn't included in the actual prototype as I am only making the Character Creation Screen)

The main focus for this Character Creator is to show diversity.  When doing your feedback on my Prototype/Game, tell me How can I show diversity in Character Creation?
